values.prompt: What did you spend the most time or energy on today?
What felt worth your time today, even if it was difficult?
What did you say no to today — and why?
What would you have regretted not doing today?
When today did you feel most aligned with yourself?
What do your actions today suggest you care about most right now?
What felt like a waste of your energy today?
If today repeated for a year, what would concern you?

emotions.prompt: What moment today triggered the strongest reaction in you?
What gave you even a small sense of relief today?
When today did you feel tense or guarded?
What emotion did you try to ignore today?
What situation today felt heavier than it should have?
What helped you feel calmer or more grounded today?
What emotion kept showing up today, even quietly?

identity.prompt: When did you feel most like yourself today?
What part of yourself did you hide today?
What role did you play today that felt natural to you?
What felt out of character for you today?
What do you wish people understood about you right now?
What label or expectation felt limiting today?
What version of yourself showed up most today?
If someone watched your day, what would they assume about you?

growth.prompt: What did you avoid today — and why?
What felt slightly uncomfortable but necessary today?
What small win did you overlook today?
What did today teach you about your limits?
What pattern from your past showed up again today?
What would tomorrow feel easier if you addressed today?
What did you handle better than you used to?
What surprised you about yourself recently?

relationships.prompt: Who affected your mood the most today?
When today did you feel most understood — or misunderstood?
What interaction gave you energy today?
What did you hold back from saying today?
Who did you feel closest to today, and why?
What do your recent interactions say about what you need from others?
